resources.string: Here you see the current status of your EV. Click any element on the screen for more information.
Your EV still has a good amount of charge remaining.
Your EV might need charging before the next trip.
Your EV might not make this trip without charging.
Swipe left to get more information about a drive.
Here you see range estimates and driving efficiency stats. Click any element on the screen for more information.
Driving faster than 100 km/h decreases your range significantly. Drive slower to preserve your range.
Hard acceleration has a negative impact on your range. Accelerate softly to get further with your EV.
With an EV, the shortest route is not always the best route. Steep hills will drain your battery and reduce range. Consider this when you plan your drive.
With smoother and smarter braking, you capture more regenerative energy and conserve power.
The range bar, together with the background color gradient, indicates how much range you have left.
Based on your current driving habits, you are a strong candidate for an electric vehicle. Driving an EV fits well with your lifestyle.
Based on your current driving habits, you are a good candidate for an electric vehicle. An EV will satisfy the majority of your needs.
